definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: si vera l., lend aid, come to help (Ar. ga03a IV. aid, succour; Sab. [[עַותַ]] n. help, Sab Denkm:91; Nab. Sin. [[עות]] in n. pr. Lzb:337 Cook:90);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. mpl. [[עוּשׁוּ וׇבׂאוּ]] Joe 4:11 but dub.; Gr Dr, plausibly, [[חוּשׁוּ]]; Che:Expos., Nov. 1897, 365 [[גְּשׁוּ]] (√ [[נגשׁ]]); [[עוּרוּ]] We Now.
